item.title: NSF Graduate Research Fellowship Information Session Scheduled for Sept. 10th.

item.title: CCPD & Western Digital HDD Teardown Workshop | Sept. 10
item.description: Join the CCPD and Western Digital for the popular HDD Teardown Workshop on Wednesday, September 10th from 5-6pm! Learn from Western Digital team members as they discuss types of cloud storage and lead you through a hands-on opportunity to disassemble a hard drive. Space is limited–register and learn more in Handshake! More information & Registration: https://rpi.joinhandshake.com/events/1789804/share_preview

item.title: Red & White Student Organization Applications
item.description: Date: Friday, August 22, 2025 - Fri , September 12, 2025 (all day) - Applications are live! Click this link to apply to join the Red & White Student Organization: https://forms.gle/14Trz9VS23FgD4iq6 Applications are open from Friday August 22nd until Friday September 12th at midnight. Once we receive your application, we will contact you about setting up an interview. Interviews will be held during the day at the Heffner Alumni House on Sat Sept 13th.

item.title: Rensselyrics Fall Auditions | Sept. 11
item.description: Date: Thursday, September 11, 2025 8:00 PM - 10:30 PM - Join the Rensselyrics for our Fall 2025 auditions! The process is easy- just prepare a verse and a chorus of any song you feel confident in, and that you feel best shows off your voice. You can learn more about the process here and also sign up for a slot if you are interested. Don’t hesitate to reach out to us with any questions!

item.title: Last Day To Make Meal Plan Changes is Sept. 5
item.description: Just a reminder to all students who have a residential meal plan that this Friday September 5, 2025 is the last day to request any decreases in your meal plans for the Fall 2025 semester. After Friday, you’ll only be able to increase it. Thank you!

item.title: Deep Dive into Webex Webinar Advanced Features Offered Monday September 8
item.description: Jim Evans, Director of MultiMedia Services, will be providing a deep dive into the Webex Webinar application: learn how to customize your webinar and how to work with the data after the webinar is done. This training is open to all members of the Rensselaer community and will be conducted remotely via Webex. Please register in advance for this event which will occur on Monday, September 8 from 10am to 11:30am: https://rensselaer.webex.com/weblink/register/rd49009520e351dc5f068fee4d79a77cd

item.title: Virtual Field Trip Workshop: Generating Virtual Tours for Immersive Learning | Sept. 8
item.description: Date: Monday, September 8, 2025 9:30 AM - Tue , September 9, 2025 5:00 PM - Learn about free virtual field trips available of authentic field sites, as well as how to design, plan and build your own virtual tours which you can use with students. The web-based Tour It tool is freely available through the NASA Infiniscope portal, as well as free pilots of Earth and Space Science.

item.description:
